input_text:
Job Title: Sales Associates - Premier Chevrolet of Carlsbad

Location: Temecula, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
5335 Paseo Del Norte, Carlsbad, CA 92008

Sales Associates 

$500 - $1,000 Signing Bonus!

$50,000 to $75,000+ Performance-Driven Income!

$16/hour + Commission & Performance Bonuses!

Premium Training & Benefits! 

Career Growth! Family-Owned!

Are you Motivated to EARN WHAT YOU DESERVE? Premier Chevrolet of Carlsbad is BOOMING with Business and seeking to hire Sales Associates to help customers select and purchase a vehicle. Our vehicles are TOP ranked in customer satisfaction and awesome to drive! YOU WILL BE SUCCESSFUL with EXCELLENT TRAINING and support from our management team! Automotive sales is lucrative and fun! The effort you put in equals your financial reward! Apply now for this great opportunity to have a rewarding career with our growing organization.

Premier is a family-owned dealer group with 40 locations in 8 states and sales surpassing two billion dollars! We appreciate our employees, invest in their success, and give back to our community with our “Giving Hope Foundation”.

We Offer Excellent Benefits:

$500 - $1,000 Signing Bonus! 50,000 to $75,000+ Performance-Driven Potential Income!$16/hour + Commission & Performance Bonuses!Premium ongoing training and professional developmentMedical, dental, and vision insurance401(k) with company match!Paid time offEmployee discounts on vehicles, service, and more!Career advancementGreat working environmentEmployee referral bonusesPaid participation in Giving Hope Community Service days givinghopenola.orgFind more information on our benefits and career paths at WhyPremierAutomotive.com


Responsibilities - Sales Associates:

Help customers select and purchase a vehicle, bring your 'A' game and a positive attitude to work every day!Greet customers and identify the vehicle that meets their needsExplain features and demonstrate vehicle operation on test drivesPresent sales pricing, explain financing options, and complete paperworkFollow up with existing customers to encourage repeat and referral businessProspect for new customersEnsure every customer has a premium buying experience


Qualifications - Sales Associates:

An energetic self-starter that's goal oriented, positive, dynamic, and tech-savvy with strong interpersonal, telephone and internet sales skillsExcellent sales, communication, customer service, and computer skillsProfessional appearanceHigh school diploma or equivalentValid driver's license and good driving record

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Sales Associates - Premier Chevrolet of Carlsbad
output_json.summary: Sales Associates needed for Premier Chevrolet of Carlsbad with competitive income potential, excellent training, and benefits.
soft_skills: Strong telephone and internet sales skills

Bring your 'A' game and a positive attitude to work every day!
Greet customers and identify the vehicle that meets their needs
Explain features and demonstrate vehicle operation on test drives
Present sales pricing, explain financing options, and complete paperwork
Follow up with existing customers to encourage repeat and referral business
Ensure every customer has a premium buying experience
benefits: Premium ongoing training and professional development
Employee discounts on vehicles, service, and more!
Paid participation in Giving Hope Community Service days
